data.product_name: Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform
data.what_is:
We deliver for small businesses with powerful tools to simplify and amplify digital marketing. Whether it's driving sales, growing a customer base or engaging an audience, we help you build strong connections and generate powerful results.

- Grow your audience
Build your list fast with landing pages, social media lead ads, and more. 

- Deepen customer relationships
Connect with people where they are--via text, email, or social--all from one platform, to drive more engagement and results for your business.

- Simplify your social media
Create and manage social posts and ads to generate awareness, drive leads and promote growth. 

- Sync with the apps you're already using
Connect with digital tools you're already using to grow your business and sell more online, faster.

Learn more at www.constantcontact.com
data.product_description: Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform is a unified sales and marketing platform designed to help businesses get more leads, close faster, and deliver results.We know marketing and growing a small business is tough-- that's why everything we design is with you in mind. It's why we've evolved our platform with powerful new features like ecommerce, SMS and CRM that deliver you bigger results and why we're building cutting-edge technologies like AI and Advanced Automations that help you do so much more in even less time.Constant Contact helps the small stand tall by delivering you the marketing solutions and world-class technology to help your small business keep up, excel and grow.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
Constant Contact is my preferred platform that I recommend to my WordPress customers for automating their email marketing and CRM. It is easy to start with a basic plan and upgrade once you get more customers or you need more users. After you start it is relatively easily to integrate it with WordPress and many other platforms.

Constant Contact offer a guide for easy implementation to platforms like Shopify, WooCommerce, Facebook, LinkedIn, Etsy, Ebay, Stripe and much more. You can setup sign-up forms, newsletter snippets, and more.

You can setup email marketing campaigns with the frequency that you need. Constant Contact allows customizations for sign-ups, welcome emails, FROM header settings, email templates etc. Then you can set your newsletter archive available for your website visitors or your social media visitors.

You can contact Customer Support by chat or phone, they are readily available and knowledgeable.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
Constant Contact has great prices for under 1000 customers and one user ($20-$50/mo), with discounts for non-profit organizations. But the prices and features grow once you need more than that. The catch with Constant Contact is that some advanced features are tight to higher price plans.

Sometimes you may pay too much just to access one or more feature that you require. Call customer service and see if they can give you a discount for specific features or plans. They are receptive to this kind of requests.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Constant Contact helps me setup marketing  campaigns faster for my customers. Then I provide them with some tutorials and help information and I can let them create their own newsletters.

You can create not only email newsletters, but also email automation (based on triggers like: sign-up, purchase etc.) landing pages, sms campaigns,sign-up forms, survey pages, and more.

The CRM platform let's you manage your newsletter visitors details, save them in specific lists. You can also do list segmentation, based on different criteria like location, most engaged, most clicks, membership etc.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
Nothing works as intended or as advertised. To begin with, none of the links in the Constant Contact navigation bar work on my Chrome or Edge browsers. You have to right click and choose "Open in New Tab" to navigate any of the links.

- It has been over 50 days after initially talking with customer support and none of my automations function as intended. I have three steps in multiple automations and the third step doesn't work in any of them. Customer Support has assured me the engineers are "looking into the issue" and to just send my e-mails manually for the time being. Not much of an automation, then.
- Using automations in connection with virtually anything other than your preset Constant Contacts list costs you extra money.
- Dynamically adding users to your Constant Contact lists is not do-able unless you want Constant Contact branding all over your webpage.
- Using automations to send reminder e-mails for topics in the future (ie an automated subscription reminder e-mail) is unavailable.
- You're not even able to remove automations from your initial list. If you make a new one,and like me - find out that the automation you intended to create isn't possible in Constanct Contact, or if you change the name or timing, or for any reason want to de-clutter your main dashboard you are unable to do so with automations.

Overall, I'm supremely dis-satisfied with the platform, and if no improvements are made over my subscription period intend to move to another service.

I have thank you automations sent on a yearly basis to customers set up, however it took me 3 seperate attempts and 2 customer service inquiries to get it working as intended.

Reports can lack depth and detail, making it difficult to draw meaningful insights from the data. In addition, the lack of queries based on custom field values limits the ability to perform granular analysis. These issues call into question SharpSpring's effectiveness as an analytics platform and need to be addressed for satisfactory performance.

SharpSpring has provided me with an incredibly powerful suite of solutions that give us amazing insight into our site's traffic and prospects. What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
It has all the core functions that a marketing automation platform should, but adds exceptional included additions like chatbox, book time, lead scoring, website visitor ID tracking, and robust automation triggers and workflows. The technical support is responsive and thorough, the customer onboarding is so helpful, and the platform makes really sophisticated marketing automation accessible for smaller businesses for whom the costs of Marketo and Pardot would be prohibitive. The tool has an incredible sales pipeline manager, and opportunities can be created automatically by the completion of forms on our website. Workflows can route particular sales leads to individual sales team members based on form field data, and automated sales tasks and alerts can be configured. The tool allows for fully customizable rich HTML emails that can be automatically sent to website visitors or internal staff members. Granular unsubscribes and the use of email preferences are really helpful in avoiding full unsubscribes.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
The email editor can feel clunky, and tweaking an email's formatting and ladjust HTML ayouts can be tricky. Confidence in the ability to create customized emails can be undermined by the those emails behaviours in various email clients, though easy Litmus integration helps overcome this challenge.   The pop-out preview can be unhelpful, especially when viewing dynamic content. Building workflows in the visual automation editor can be arduous. There is no ability to send "Operational" emails that bypass Unsubscribe settings for those emails that are clearly not marketing messages.

The email marketing capabilities have provided all the functions we've needed, even if it can be time-consuming setting up the automation workflows and action groups. The visitor ID tracking will empower our client care and sales teams, and provide important information about website visits. The biggest benefits of the tool are the wide range of sales and marketing functions that are supported by rich reporting. To have a sales tool completely integrated with our marketing automation functions is so valuable, and the identification of contacts as leads or customers allows us to use Sharpspring for client care as well as sales and lead management.

ALWAYS rebuild lists before using - do not assume they have auto-populated!

all_reviews.review_title: Good marketing automation service, but beware the pricing and billing.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
I like that:
- You can see returning visitors to your website and track activity
- The chatbot
- Creating unique Workflows
- Chatting in with support is pretty good
- Creating custom campaign utm codes
- Creating emails
- tracking budgets

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
I don't like:
- Sometimes it's buggy
- Social posting is limited (FB, twitter, Linkedin, that is all)
- They don't connect with Microsoft ads either
- The scripts that you put on your website slow the site speed scores down
- We were supposed to be able to do a certain level of competitor social listening but they removed it after we signed up.
- When we signed up over a year ago they said there would be Instagram, but they never added it.
- My main issue is the way they handle billing and fees. It's sneaky. They said they'd increase accounts no more than 10% per year. Then they increased one of my clients 25% and the client hasn't even been on for a year. They added it as a fee to month-to-month users to push them into annual contracts. Mind you, month-to-month was one of the main selling points. I went back and forth in email with the billing department who takes about a week to reply each time. The billing department acknowledged that they didn't explain it to us properly on sign up, but refused to honor the original pricing increase because it's based on their fiscal year not a year from when the client signs up. So I spoke with the client and they agreed to the annual contract, but only after it billed another month for the increased price. I asked for a refund on the prepaid 2 months that were billed at the higher price and they denied it. So here I am, signing up clients and making the company money who offers to pay you in gift cards to write reviews for them, yet they won't refund the client $250 for the two overpriced months to keep everyone happy after I signed up the client on an annual contract.

And with all of that, I caution you that their plan is to get you and all of your clients and your processes deeply integrated into their system and then jack up the price on you after it's too hard to leave.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
Be sure to fully understand how their billing works. Once you get your business and your client's businesses intertwined with theirs it may be difficult to leave as pricing increases.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest benefit to us and our clients is we're able to track leads better and see where they come from, for example Google Ads vs Google organic leads. While they offer other things, that's probably the biggest thing for me.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
I am a 15-year marketing and advertising veteran. I have evaluated and purchased HubSpot, ActiveCampaign, Pardot, and more through the years. SharpSpring is by far the best combination of software and value. It has everything HubSpot has but for significantly less cost. The UI is expertly crafted into sales, marketing, and reporting sections. It's incredibly easy and intuitive to find what you need. Plus, if you have a question, you can Google what you are looking for and almost always find the answer in their help documentation very quickly.

The visual drag and drop email designer and landing page builder are excellent. The ability to easily create multi-page sales funnels is a unique and invaluable feature.

Anyone evaluating marketing automation and CRM platform should go to SharpSpring first, before looking at any other options. You won't be disappointed.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
A minor downside for agencies is having to use their customer billing platform. It took a little getting used to the concept but I believe it can be a great value for most people.

all_reviews.review_title: Lead conversion as robust as you need it to be
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
Simple interface, full funnel, wide array of capabilities - to name a few of the reasons why SharpSpring is the most important software in our MarTech stack. It's easy to onboard team members and allows admins to adjust permissions that comply with our CRM's settings. Merge variables make for seamless personalized messaging that blurs the lines of mass email sends and leads to higher direct response. Robust and intricate reporting. All-in-all a really useful marketing automation software. As my company's proof of concept, it has helped establish our online presence - something we didn't have much of before.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
Email builder could be more dynamic - there are some static features; spacing, limited text blocks, and alignment, and a few of the issues I've ran into with senior management where SharpSpring limits how you can build emails. I think they lack in this field when stacked against other marketing automation platforms but they have made some additions/corrections to the email builder in the past few months which brings more faith in the people behind the product - knowing they will deliver on the issues that continue to be brought up - SharpSpring gives each of their partners (whether directs, like us, or agencies) a voice, and I find that really valuable.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
This applies to direct clients: Take a look at tech stack and decide which features are most important. If you can audit all of the ways you currently market and what you are missing, chances are SharpSpring has multiple solutions to your problems or are willing to help you find alternative solutions. The team at SharpSpring is great, they realize the (sort of) heavy lift at the beginning and are available around the clock & SharpSpring support is always available and quick to respond. Not to mention SharpSpring is much more cost efficient than their competitors and it's worth at least getting on a demo and comparing your options. What they lack in some features, they make up in others. I'm content with how I've built our instance over the last 6 months and I've barely scratched the surface with the number of capabilities at my disposal.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Data management/organization, personalized messaging, simple automation workflow creation, and ultimately getting our systems and processes aligned to handle a large influx of new leads on a rolling basis. Naming conventions allow me to keep everything organized and it's simple to create a campaign from the ground up. When importing leads from Salesforce, custom ID's allow us to properly tag new leads. Lists and the ability to manually add or dynamically add leads to lists using action groups, is huge for management of multiple campaigns. I get to be hands on with campaigns from lead gen to sales conversion and know exactly where each lead is in marketing funnel/how they are interacting with our campaigns, then be able to report on those individual leads. SharpSpring truly is full funnel, transparent, marketing automation.

all_reviews.review_title: SharpSpring has Been a Game Changer for Our Agency
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
The biggest benefit of SharpSpring is having visibility into the leads we generate. In the past we could see impressions and clicks and website visits from our campaigns. Now we are seeing the actual leads and being able to follow activity after the initial contact. The added visibility has been an absolute game changer in the value we can provide our clients.

I really like the Life of the Lead feature where once you have a lead in the system you can track all their activity in great detail, seeing when they came back to the website, what pages they went to, if they opened emails, etc.

We've even had instances where clients claimed they were not getting leads from our campaigns and once SharpSpring was installed, not only could we now provide reports of leads we were generating, but we caught a hole in their customer service where leads we were providing were not getting responses from scheduling staff. So we not only provided reports of the leads we generated, but helped close a gap in a serious customer service issue that was happening.

The automations are really powerful and I like being able to have so much in one system.

We've also recently started using the CRM and the clients are really happy with the features of the CRM and having it work directly with marketing activities.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
It takes more time to set things up, but its worth it for all the insights you gain. The design capabilities in the emails are a bit clunky and limited. Hopefully they will improve on that.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
There are a lot of great features in SharpSpring to support clients success, so it's a great system to have. That said, if it only had its ability to track leads in detail I would still be sold on it for that feature alone. It does take some effort to get up to speed on everything. There are some funky things in learning process. For example, on triggers for sending an alert when a form is submitted, there was small function that made only send once that was easy to miss, so after I tested a form once, it no longer worked. Once support helped me figure this out it was all good. That said, their support is amazing and makes getting up to speed much easier.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
The main problem as I mentioned above is that we previously had zero visibility into the leads we generated for clients. Relying on clients to accurately identify leads we brought to them was a recipe for failure and making us look bad. SharpSpring gave us the power to accurately track leads we generated, having better insight into the effectiveness of our campaigns to improve on our work, AND get credit for our successes.

all_reviews.review_title: SharpSpring Delivers Tremendous Value for Marketing / Sales Teams on a Budget
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
An expensive marketing automation solution wasn't an option for our in-house marketing team. SharpSpring delivers all of the features that are important to our marketing / sales teams without the cost associated with other marketing automation solutions:
- The intuitive interface allows most users to quickly master basic functions without distracting from their daily tasks.
- The email builder is approachable for non-coders, but offers the ability to edit HTML.
- Integration with third-party forms (we use Gravity Forms) was simple and allows us to use all of our existing forms.
- The media library allows us to quickly track engagement with our marketing collateral.
- Social media tools allow us to schedule posts and setup listening.
- The personas are perfect for our marketing / sales teams and help us quickly segment email content / offers.
- Automations are easy to create and manage in SharpSpring's visual workflow editor.
- The "Life of the Lead" is a great resource for members of our salesforce as they prepare to call on a prospect.

Best of all; because SharpSpring doesn't cost as much as some of the other marketing automation solutions, we are able to more reallocate budget to our campaigns.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
There isn't much to dislike about SharpSpring. That being said, we have had some users complain that SharpSpring's default sales reports aren't robust enough (this can be resolved with some work to create more customized reports). It also lacks the ability to query opportunities based on the content of custom fields. These issues are more than offset by SharpSpring's. helpful support team; who are friendly and knowledgable. Additionally, we've opted against using the webpage builder as we've found it easier to work within WordPress.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
SharpSpring delivers comparable value to other marketing automation solutions for a fraction of the cost. The single biggest factor for us in making the decision to use SharpSpring was the cost of the CRM which wasn't bundled with other alternatives that we were considering.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
SharpSpring makes it easier for our marketing team to show the impact of our work to the executive team. We can show engagement with top-of-funnel content on the company blog and social media channels as well as track the ROI of attending industry conferences / conventions.

all_reviews.review_title: Perspective from a Beginner on SharpSpring
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
I am fairly new to SharpSpring, so I have not discovered all the bells and whistles yet - not by a long-shot. But I have enjoyed the process of getting to know this powerful tool. As a graphic designer, I am better with a non-linear, intuitive interface when it comes to learning. SharpSpring knows that, and allows for as much drag-n-drop as possible, where it is logical. It's nice not having to figure out how to prioritize or move sections of an email or landing page around - I can click and drag. I come from a primarily print background, so the fact that I can build a website and an email after just a bit of training and using their great live chat feature makes me like this program all the more. The classroom videos are clear and just the about the best instructional videos you can find.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
Nothing just yet sticks out as lacking, but I have only just begun to play with its' capabilities. It's like I'm taking a flashlight and going into one room and figuring it out, and then going to the next. The fact I can do that is great, but there's much more for me to learn. The good news is that I'm looking forward to it! That credit goes to SharpSpring onboarding process, the responsive live chat, the excellent instructional videos, and a very enthusiastic owner of my company who also enjoys the process of investigating the clicks from current and potential clients. The analytics are what makes him most interested and excited.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Integration of email, landing pages, marketing, sales, creating effective client profiles and targeted communications, using in-depth analytics on specific intiatives called "campaigns" to give insights about the effectiveness of all the tools and which ones are best to pursue. Conversely, learning which campaigns and social media initiatives which do not yield great results. These are all part of SharpSpring. It will keep you entertained and stimulated for hours. Not as good as binge watching Breaking Bad, but close. So that's already saying a lot.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
I've been a SharpSpring fan and partner for 6+ years, nearly since the start of their company. The culture at the company is amazing which translates to a well thought out platform that is intuitive and rich with features and benefits for small to large organizations. SharpSpring is best leveraged in our experience for companies that have a steady flow of incoming leads from marketing efforts and they have a sales team that will leverage the data collected in the platform to assist in the process of nurturing and closing the deals they are working on.

The platform is scalable so that a company can start using the CRM and email messages as a phase 1 start and continually add more integration as time goes on. There is a lot of flexibility for building out automation and modifying the CRM and Sales Tools to fit the unique needs of the clients we have brought onto the system.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
SharpSpring is very eager to release new features and in some cases does so without fully testing them. It's like buying a new iPhone, you always wait for the 2nd or 3rd version to become available so tweaks can be made to the first version. They have offered several ways to share feedback and suggestions for improving an already stellar platform, from a Facebook community to an online portal to share ideas and use community voting to adopt new changes to the platform.

Recently they adopted a new billing platform so all clients would pay SharpSpring directly in order to comply with new U.S. sales tax collection laws. This was a small hiccup to our standard policy of billing clients directly, however, SharpSpring is diligently working to get this change implemented.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
If you are in the marketing for a customizable CRM and Sales Platform, SharpSpring brings a lot of punch for its value. Just be sure you are working with a consultant or agency that has a deep understanding and practical experience of creating a customized strategic plan for your organization to leverage the full potential of what SharpSpring has to offer.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We help our clients' sales team create a repeatable and trackable process to identify, nurture and convert leads into customers. At the same time we ensure all of their existing and future marketing efforts, be it digital or offline such as trade shows, radio, print ads, etc, are being tracked alongside the sales tools so we can provide clear transparency to the ROI on their marketing efforts.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Marketing Automation/CRM platform for SMEs and Agencies
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
As an agency, we've worked with SharpSpring since 2016 and have helped many of our clients streamline their marketing activity and processes through using the platform.

SharpSpring is a comprehensive marketing automation and CRM platform, ideally suited to SME business. They are continuously releasing new features so the platform is constantly evolving which is great for us as an agency as well as for our clients.

SharpSpring's route to market is via predominantly via agencies. This makes them very agency focused and respectful of the partner relationship. This avoids us as a partner competing with them as a vendor - unlike some other vendors who operate direct-to-market alongside agency partners. They're always looking for new ways to support us as an agency and actively encourage partner feedback to help prioritise new features.

Pricing is also realistic - many other marketing automation platforms with similar features are simply too expensive for SMEs to justify the investment or require expensive add-ons.

Help & support is really impressive - aside from great online help, when we log support tickets, we always get a very quick response. The support team then actively work with us to resolve any issues we may have. I'd rate their support as one of the best I've come across and it makes a massive difference knowing we can get help quickly.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
There's nothing I particularly dislike but I'd like to see deeper integration with Social Media, particularly around lead engagement and page activity. This isn't a criticism of what's there at the moment, but it is an area where other MA tools have a few more features.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
Take a demo, speak to agencies like us and take a 30 day trial. There are quite a few marketing automation platforms on the market and the only real way to evaluate them is to use them. Beware of tiered pricing and reduced features in the lower-end versions of other MA tools. One great thing about SharpSpring is that it's an all-in-one price which means you get all the features.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're helping our clients realise a structured approach to their marketing and sales processes. From tracking inbound traffic, through lead nurture and seamlessly onto creating and managing opportunities in the CRM, through SharpSpring we're providing a single platform for our customers to not only automate their marketing and sales activity but more importantly, measure it.

all_reviews.review_title: Best Integrated Marketing Automation & CRM for B2B Startups
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
- Easy to use with no technical expertise: create emails/landing pages using templates and/or drag-and-drop editor without html knowledge
- Easy to add custom fields, customize pipelines and deal stage thresholds, add dashboard widgets, create automation workflows, etc. without developer assistance
- Get visitor/engagement data from your own website/blog. You're not constrained to develop your website and host your blog on the SharpSpring platform in order to take advantage of insights.
- Integrated sales engagement functionality keeps sales team from having to start from scratch on emails and campaigns.
- Unlimited user model allows you to self-manage access and add users so they can prove value to themselves
- Customer service is knowledgeable and highly responsive. Submit help through online ticketing or chat.
- Integrated help documents, page overlays for wayfinding, contextual videos help a user self-serve to optimized use of SharpSpring. A "progress meter" gives you at-a-glance guide to your success on the platform and gives quick tips/checklist to take advantage of available functionality.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
While the canned reports available in SharpSpring are sufficient for most organizations and processes, and you can download csv files of most data, there's no integrated report writer functionality to create custom reports from user-defined parameters.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:

- If you're struggling to get sales and marketing on the same page and/or lacking data on the ROI of marketing initiatives, an integrated system like SharpSpring will help facilitate that.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
1. Integrating marketing automation, CRM and pipeline management allows teams to achieve a 360-degree view of the lifecycle of a lead. Instead of cobbling together assorted systems, which severely hampers accurate data gathering.
2. Best value for the investment, hands down.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Value and Continuous Improvement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
SharpSpring is a great one stop shop for full stack marketing and sales. It covers all the core features we need to design and execute inbound and outbound campaigns and programs. While at any one point in time, any solution may have a better individual feature, but SharpSpring offers "90%" of the features we need for "30%" of the cost of some of the other top marketing automation platforms. We also think "Marketing Automation" is in some ways the wrong category for SharpSpring because the integrated CRM makes this a single full-funnel platform. This also contributes to cost effectiveness because the cost of SharpSpring can be spread across all users instead of many solutions that have a per user cost. As an agency, we also like SharpSpring's commitment to their agency partners and excellent support.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
Until recently, SharpSpring has not had a great reporting and analytics engine, but new drag and drop widget-based custom reporting features are now in beta. The Social Assistant (mobile app and chrome plugin) are missing some features and need some attention. The Social Media features allows listening,  scheduling and manage social posts, but in some cases, and with lower volumes, posting natively on Social sites ensures an optimized post or dedicated social media management platforms offer good features like previewing the look of the post and shortening URLs. Also, SharpSpring's CRM is not optimally setup for recurring revenue.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
As with any solution, we suggest going through a feature scorecard to ensure that importants features are in place and adequate. For example, consider your business model as well. Depending on whether you are selling a solution or product with recurring revenue, other outbound selling features engagement, etc. may be needed.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are helping companies use SharpSpring in their full-funnel marketing programs. We also use SharpSpring ourselves to generate leads from our website and through landing pages, forms and content downloads as well as keeping prospects engaged with email marketing and 1:1 outbound "SmartMail" emails. SharpSpring is rolling out a new advertising and retargeting platform that we plan to use soon.

all_reviews.review_title: Why I love SharpSpring!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
I love SharpSpring for its agency focus. There are many marketing automation platforms, but SharpSpring is specifically designed for agencies like ours to best serve our clients.  It is a critical distinction for us in assisting our clients, and, combined with their attractive price point and feature-rich platform, it made ShaprSpring a. no-brainer.

I also like the number of tutorials, get started videos, etc that are available, in addition to our dedicated business contact at SharpSpring. They have been extremely responsive any time we have ever need assistance.

Finally, I like that they are constantly adding new features that are meaningful. Often platforms tout their new features but they have no relevance to our day-to-day needs. SharpSpring is the opposite. They really do listen to customer suggestions and do their best to implement them in a timely manner.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
The Facebook posting tool could be better but SharpSpring has told us that some of the peculiarities that result are the result of Facebook's API.

Also, like all marketing automation platforms, you really need to spend a substantial amount of time pre-planning your ideal flows for customer communications before diving in. While you can always make changes to your workflows, setting it up correctly from the start will save you tons of time and tears!

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
Truly examine the needs of your agency before shopping marketing automation platforms. Make a list of the features you actually require.  We found that other platforms offered more features but with 2 problems--1, we didn't really see the value in the additional features and would likely not have used them; and 2, they would bundle unwanted additional features with features we needed as "optional add-ons" at higher price points, which was very frustrating. SharpSpring does not do that. It is flat-rate pricing with ALL the features we really use.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Customer engagement, lead scoring and ROI tracking are the most obvious benefits. We have been able to do far more for our clients and maximize their budgets using SharpSpring's platform.

We are helping our customers save time and money by providing pre-qualified leads to their sales team, saving them quite a bit of time and money. They are definitely able to do far more with less using SharpSpring.

The other major problem we are solving is consistency of message. By focusing our marketing efforts for our leints on SharpSpring's platform, we are able to control the majority of our marketing efforts through a single spot, track them, measure engagement, and have a complete record of interactions with each of our clients customers and leads. With clients pressing us for actionable data, SharpSpring has made this far simpler and more effective than other platforms we have tried.

As a marketing agency that sells marketing automation solutions to clients we have tried many different platforms with our favourites being Infusionsoft and Active Campaign. Top end marketing automation functionality at unbelievable prices.

Lastly, if you are looking to integrate SS with other platforms then they don't have many Native options and third parties can be a real challenge.

- Make sure your Database and Pipeline is ready before you sign up
- Have a basic plan and concepts for Emails, Landing pages and forms
Ensure your business has a foundation/strategy mapped out before deciding what to automation tool to go with.

all_reviews.review_title: Big Bang for the Buck
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
SharpSpring has is very feature rich for the price. It combines CRM, Marketing Automation, Social Media and Email Marketing into one platform. As a small business, we were looking for an all-in-one solution that was easy to implement and affordable. The features we like the best are form integration with the website, marketing automation workflows, the sales pipeline, "life of the lead" tracking, and visitor ID activity (seeing what companies visit your website).

I wish the email templates were easier to work with. They have nice "designer" templates that you can use off-the-shelf, but they don't render nicely across all email clients, so they need to be tweaked by someone who understands and can work with the HTML code. I wish the templates were more like that of a Mailchimp, for example, where there were more features for controlling layout and everything was optimized for all email clients across device types. The other thing I wish SharpSpring had was the ability to go back and see lifetime activity on visitor IDs. It only keeps record of the last 30 days. We found a workaround for this, but it would be nice to be able to pull this information out of the system.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
Make sure you can get adoption across your organization to get the most out of your investment.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sharpspring has been an integral part of our inbound marketing success, automating the process of capturing and nurturing inbound leads. We're also able to identify leads early and better prioritize our outbound sales outreach to target companies who have already expressed interest by visiting the website. In addition, we have better visibility into our overall pipeline, the stages of each deal, and total pipeline value. We can set up campaigns and track ROI on digital marketing efforts. It also helps us stay organized company-wide on what's going on with accounts and opportunities.

all_reviews.review_content:

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
There is no data integrity with SharpSpring or escalation process to fix issues. Email reports contain terrible data that does not match between internal and exported reports or life of the lead data. Customer support reps aren't empowered to make decisions OR escalate requests to upper management, and when you do finally get in contact with someone from management through digging for an email, they are only partially authorized/experienced to help with the issue so it goes nowhere.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
If you want a software for the sake of analytics and tracking email engagement, SharpSpring isn't ready for that yet. Until they can accept some accountability for their lack of data integrity and have a high-up manager force two or more departments to work with each other to actually fix anything, it's not worth it. Also, if you pay employees to work out of SharpSpring everyday, plan on having them twiddle their thumbs for 3-5 hours per week since their product development team pushes updates live continuously during working hours, breaking key features for basic use in doing so. For some reason, they don't release updates as a weekly batch on non-working hours - they insist on breaking features nonstop and causing us to waste money on employees.

(Hourly rate per employee * number of employees * hours SharpSpring key features are down from improperly pushed product updates = net weekly loss.)

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Very few. We thought we were massively increasing our email engagement, but it turns out that was all due to false reports on SharpSpring's part. The all benefits realized were artificial.

all_reviews.review_title: SharpSpring is a constructive marketing platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
I work as a Digital Marketing Manager at e-intelligence, my team has to work with SharpSpring
for our marketing activities. After using it for a quarter, I can say that subscribing the software is a
very good decision for my business. Few points that I liked about the software:

1)They provide great customer service, 2) The initial training facilitates getting acquainted to the software, 3) It is an easy-to-use software, 4) It gets upgraded over time, 5) They send alert when the user opens the email, 6) Its sales pipeline function allows to generate multiple reports and can even export the data, 7) Lead score makes it easy for maintaining a lead status and automating lead touch points

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
There are few areas where SharpSpring is still trying to match with the other providers:

1) You need to spare a considerable amount of time learning the software, but once used, it is a comprehensive platform. 2) The email builder tool can be improved by making it user-friendly. It is still much better than the competitors. 3) It becomes glitchy when new features are implemented. The automation function does not work at its full potential during such a scenario. 4) Its mobile app is clumsy at times while opening. It is not as good as the Web view.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Well, more than 1000 digital marketing agencies have been using SharpSpring. Undoubtedly, I am one of them. If your marketing activities need attention and if you are seriously looking to grow your customer base with marketing and sales efforts, then I would definitely say that SharpSpring is worth a try. However, always consider the following before you opt for any marketing automation software:

1) Research the marketing tools and choose according to your marketing needs, 2) Calculate/consider the amount of time spent on learning the software, 3) Check the demonstration of the software before buying the subscription.

all_reviews.review_title: Bumpy Start, Great Overall
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
The breadth of the platform. It has all the features you want, need, and didn't even know it had.
Where it lacks in polish, it makes up for in power - no question.

While some might not like how customizable the ENTIRE platform is, it gives you the tools you need to do what you want. If you're expecting to hop in, map some fields, and get automating - you might be a little disappointed. If you're looking to build your dream digital strategy and not be limited by pre-defined fields and automation flows, this is your tool.

If you don't have a team with an Art Director that is comfortable with some HTML, you will likely need a consultant (if you're very particular about email and page design).

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
It's a little clunky and, if I were to nitpick, I could write several pages of change requests for the interface. You enter the platform blind, as nothing is pre-configured - which is a blessing and a curse. While you are not held back by limited automation flows, custom fields, etc, the number of options can be crippling. Also, the WYSIWYG tools are just that and you're going to have to play with them for a while. If you're capable of ripping out some of their code and starting fresh, it'll do what you need.

Also worth noting - in my detailed feature review, most features were knocked a point or two for the interface. It really does have everything you'll probably ever need and it'll help in saving time. While it might not be the best or most polished - it is 100% worth it for the price, especially compared to nearly every other end-to-end service such as this.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
If you're a massive enterprise, it probably isn't the right solution. If you're a small/medium sized business or a startup that needs to stay in communication with many customers and prospects and would like to be able to edit just about everything they'll see from web to email, this is for you.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Marketing automation - drip campaigns, newsletters, dynamic content, lead scoring, everything you'd expect. It's taken some time to get everything up and running (we have a small team), but it's pretty exciting to see it start paying off. I cannot say we have truly benefited yet, but we see the potential and are starting to see the payoff.

all_reviews.review_title: SharpSpring Is My Team's MVP
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
What I like best about SharpSpring is that they specialize in providing powerful professional tools to marketing agencies for a fraction of what other platforms like Infusionsoft and HubSpot charge.

I spent a good month looking at all the other companies in the automation space. I sat through multiple demos and heard all of the sales pitches. I settled on ShaprSpring for three main reasons.

1) They had good tools.  Their workflows and campaign tools were every bit as good as what I saw with other platforms. I could finally have my landing page builder and my email automation in the same application along with an awesome CRM and sales manager.

2) They were so much less expensive! I'm not kidding you. My cost for SharpSpring is a fraction of what I would pay for the same services through HubSpot or one of the others.

3) They don't compete with me. Sure, companies can use SharpSpring directly, but they pay way more than agencies do. These people have a real desire to help marketing agencies succeed and they back it up by providing serious value. Infusionsoft wanted to charge me more than my house payment each month for services and then they were going to directly compete with me for my clients' business! SharpSpring plays for my team and I wouldn't trade them for anything.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
Sometimes I need connectivity to a service or want a feature that is still in development, so I have to have some patience. But, honestly, that's a small price to pay for the dedication and hustle that these folks bring to my team. They are constantly working to improve the product and I'm continually impressed with their results.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
If you are an agency, there is no better partner than SharpSpring. Make sure you ask anyone else you may be considering how they keep you clients from going around you and dealing with them directly. Also, pay close attention to the number of manageable contacts and customer accounts you get. SharpSpring give you 100,000 contacts and three client contacts without charging you extra. Most other don't even come close to that.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
With ShaprSpring, I am able to offer game-changing automation to my clients. I use the CRM to collect customer data from everything - recruiting ads, marketing ads, Facebook ads, landing pages, website pages, you name it. They've always had Google Analytics and Facebook Insights, but with SharpSpring, they now have names, faces, and profiles.

I have found ways to integrate chat applications, Facebook Messenger, text message applications, and more into SharpSpring. This give me the ability to, not only market to my client's customers, but to re-market to them as well using email campaigns.

The other really cool thing that I have been able to do with SharpSpring is export contacts from the CRM and load them into Facebook for audience building.  Combining a bit of collected data about our local loyal customers with the power of a Facebook lookalike audience delivers ad targeting on an unprecedented level.

They have hit a sweet spot with agencies like us of offering a solid platform with truly exceptional value. Not only are the monthly costs very affordable, but they also include free licenses for us to use with clients. When you consider the fact that competitors want us to charge clients in the region of PS500 or more per month for marketing automation then this is a perfect way to get clients on board at very low risk. On top of this, the SharpSpring customer support is truly excellent with the team being quick to reply and eager to resolve any issues as soon as possible.

The UX could be improved in certain instances to be more intuitive but the team at SharpSpring welcome feature requests and feedback and always come back with good reasons why they are or are not going to develop your request.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
Simply the best value marketing automation platform out there in terms of pricing and features. You will not find another company that comes close. This is especially important for small to medium -sized agencies where monthly license costs are key. The free licenses that SharpSpring gives you are also vital in ensuring that you can onboard clients with little or no friction.

SharpSpring is very likely to be the most important investment we have ever made in terms of tools and software. We lacked the ability to create landing pages or email campaigns, or the capability to give clients detailed insight into who was interacting with digital campaigns. It gives us a huge new capability to offer clients inbound marketing and lead scoring as well other really valuable tools such as the ability to create attractive landing pages, forms and email campaigns. Of course, we can also create drip-feed email campaigns based on customer behaviours. The level of prospect insight is also key for clients who want to understand more about who is interacting with them digitally. We had been looking at other marketing automation platforms for a year (especially Hubspot) but the huge price tag was a barrier to entry. SharpSpring has completely transformed our offering to make it vastly more compelling to prospects and existing clients. This is especially the case as they include free licenses for us to use with clients as we see fit. I'll even venture, that SharpSpring is such good value that I had to see what the catch was....and there is none (they even give you a one month notice period). SharpSpring is great and once we have demonstrated the capabilities of the platform then to many people it's a no-brainer. In time, I have no doubt that it will open up several other revenue streams.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Platform For Small to Mid Sized Businesses
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
SharpSpring has an incredible range of built-in features... and they are constantly evolving.  Since we first started working with their platform (for clients), we've seen the addition of Personas (love this!), landing pages (could use some improvement), visual workflow (finally!) and other smaller but powerful components.

The platform also comes with a decent (very basic but customization ready) CRM and sales pipeline.  These are powerful tools for small B2B businesses who are not wanting to break out their sales automation and customer management from their marketing automation.

SharpSpring is also building out more dynamic integration options which obviously makes them a stronger choice than many platforms who limit your connectivity to API or Zapier.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
Customer support isn't always responsive nor thorough. You need to be very persistent.

The landing page builder is restrictive. We find for some clients its best to go with Unbounce and connect the platforms, while other simpler clients enjoy the built in landing page features.

The email templates are almost nil... again you need to populate the platform with your own designs.

The reporting is decent but for some of our clients not nearly robust enough.  (We are looking for a way to integrate a reporting software - if anyone has suggestions please let me know!).

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
There are a lot of amazing, cost effective platforms for start-ups, small to mid sized businesses.  Make a list of the goals you have for your platform and then compare the feature sets with what you require.

As well, be sure to do a trial run to ensure the platform will be as easy to use as you expect (keeping in mind there is always a learning curve).

Finally, implement with a plan. This may be an easy system to get used to... but if it's not set-up correctly it may feel like your climbing a mountain before you feel that it is bringing in results.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use SharpSpring with a few clients to:
1) Improve customer engagement and retention
2) Keep a clear record of customer engagement and status
3) Capture leads and drive prospects to conversion
4) Track campaign spend for closed loop reporting

all_reviews.review_title: Sharpspring Review From an Agency Perspective
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
There are a few key features that I believe set Sharpspring apart from similar automation platforms in this price range -

1. Ability to share content across client instances -

As a small agency, maximizing our resources and bandwidth is crucial.  Content creation can be a real time sink, so having the ability to use templates, emails, etc across instances saves a ton of time in both creation and organization.

2. Life of Lead - (& Email syncing)
I am not aware of another platform that offers something like this or in the way that Sharpspring does it. I have used about a dozen different platforms from SMB to enterprise level (think Eloqua, Hubspot, Marketo) and this feature is only available in Sharpspring to my knowledge.  This is the feature that tends to get the most 'ooohs and aaahs' when we demo it to a client.  I would include the ability to sync your email Mailbox with Sharpspring as part of this feature.


3. Full functional CRM - I know that a lot of platforms do this or can integrate with a 3rd party CRM, but having it all in a single platform is a plus for us because most of our clients are SMB and do not have the budget for something like Salesforce or to program an API.  In my opinion it makes no sense to have a MAP and not have either a built-in CRM or an integration with one.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
1. Communication regarding updates - It sometimes seems like new dev items get migrated into production without notification (or at least without proactive notification.  By "proactive" I mean in a way where I do not have to search it out in the partner portal).  As an Eloqua user I am accustom to very thorough and precise communication re: dev items both on the roadmap and soon to be migrated.

2. Antiquated Workflow Editor - I just recently learned that Sharpspring will be rolling out a new Workflow Editor that intends to be more of a GUI-click and drag editor.  Until that happens, the current workflow editor can be confusing when creating flows with lots of steps.  Sharpspring's current editor is essentially the same as Hubspot's in that regard, but a world away from something like Eloqua or even Autopilot.  I am looking forward to the new one.

3. Importing/Updating/Exporting Data - My biggest gripe in this area is on the export side.  Every time I want to export data I have to export the entire contact record with all of the fields. sometimes this is OK, and other times it can be a real pain when there are a lot of custom fields.  I rarely ever need the entire record,

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
I think I pretty much covered this in the "Likes" section.  Resource/Bandwidth allocation is one of our biggest concerns, and we are solving some of that by having the ability to have one marketing automation "hub" for all of our Sharpspring clients.  We do have clients that use other platforms, and it definitely makes it easier when I can stay within a single platform and work on multiple client projects at the same time.

all_reviews.review_title: Enterprise marketing automation without the enterprise price-tag
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
SharpSpring offers all of the core features needed to execute a solid marketing automation & lead nurturing strategy--but it costs far less than HubSpot, Pardot, Marketo and other major marketing automation tools.

I've found the platform to be overall very user friendly, and the SharpSpring team is great about releasing new features with lots of documentation. Recently SharpSpring added a "personas" feature that delivers much of the functionality that had made Pardot unique.

The VisitorID tool has been a godsend for our sales team: there's nothing like being able to show our sales team which companies visited our websites as a result of our content marketing efforts.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
There's one email feature in particular: the ability to link in a built-in web-only email is currently missing from SharpSpring. I know from speaking with the SharpSpring team that this is in development--so hopefully this won't be a concern for too long.

SharpSpring's landing page tool has a different feel than what you'll find in other marketing automation systems or E.S.P.--it's a bit more like WishPond or UnBounce. This isn't a bad thing, but it can add to your learning curve if you're coming in from a different marketing automation tool.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our agency uses SharpSpring for its own marketing automation, behavior tracking, email marketing and CRM functions, and we've been extending its use out to our clients.

So far, we've been able to garner the same benefits from using other tools like HubSpot, Pardot, etc. without incurring a massive monthly expense.

3. We're creating landing pages for specific campaigns, which helps to fine tune the sales message and make conversion more likely.

all_reviews.review_title: You would be wise to explore SharpSpring
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
Nothing matches the needs, wants, and expectation of small businesses better than SharpSpring. It's my favorite things about SharpSpring because, at my marketing agency PlanStartGrow, we focus exclusively on small business clients.

As a professional marketer with two decades of hands-on experience, I've many of the popular customer relationship management (CRMs), marketing automation, email marketing, landing page, online form, website analytics, and blog systems.

Whenever we meet a prospective client are struggling with marketing tools designed for mid-sized or large companies that are too complicated to learn and challenging to use, showing them how to do the things they want using SharpSpring instead is usually all it takes for them to switch.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
The thing that bugs me about SharpSpring (the company and product) is that they are rarely known by business owners or marketing managers. This puts our marketing agency in the position of introducing the company and then positioning the product against alternatives prospective clients already use or know. Essentially, this means we have to market and sell our agency and then do this again for SharpSpring too.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
If you are a marketing agency, you would be wise to explore how to leverage SharpSpring to improve your service delivery to clients. There's no reason to use more complex or expensive tools, especially if your clients do not login to these same tools.

If you are a marketing manager at a small or medium-sized business, you owe it to your company to learn about SharpSpring. It's probable that switching to SharpSpring for some or most of marketing functions would free-up budget you could apply towards marketing campaigns.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
At PlanStartGrow, we create automated marketing for small businesses. The core business problem this solves is that while all businesses have significant marketing needs, only small businesses lake the resources, budgets, and expertise to accomplish them using customary approaches. That's why creating profitable marketing that works automatically is magical.

Here's a real-world example:

A higher education client in Southern California was experiencing a steady decline in enrollments and boosting marketing budgets was not helping. The owners, executives, and marketing managers at this "company" are as highly educated and capable as one would expect and had tried different marketing agencies and systems without success.

We consolidated multiple marketing systems using SharpSpring and then used the additional capabilities SharpSpring includes to reveal one of their marketing campaigns with a six-figure annual budget generated a huge number of inquiries (aka leads) but almost no enrollments (sales). Re-directing these wasted budget dollars towards existing campaigns that resulted in enrollments provided a short-term solution while we automated and optimized all of their marketing.

all_reviews.review_title: Sharpspring:  With Great Value Comes Great Opportunity
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
We have been on the Sharpspring platform for nearly a year now and it has changed our agency.  Back in the day (you know, a "whole" 8 years ago), inbound marketing and the software that supported its methodology was not a very crowded sandbox.  But now there are all kinds of full blown platforms and other software stacks  - needless to say, the playground is getting full.  What made Sharpspring appealing to us what how it allowed us to "handle the transaction".  Our clients know we use Sharpspring but they continually refer to it as if it were "our platform" - this instantly changes the way they (and prospects) see us.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
That being said, it has not been without its bumps and bruises.  There have been times when features just didn't seem to work or required some guesswork (i.e. - building dynamic lists based on lead info seems to be hit or miss and the email builder is a bit clunky).  In all fairness, we have just been too busy to become fluent in all aspects of the platform so this gripe may totally be on us, and not Sharpspring.

All in all, I don't see us moving in another direction any time soon.  We are a growing agency and we have hitched our growth to that of the Sharpspring platform.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
If you are a growing agency or business you owe it to yourself to at least give Sharpspring an opportunity.  The way it is priced and is ease of implementation will give you and your clients early wins, especially if there hasn't been a platform like this in place yet in your agency or business.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sharpspring is a true hub for our business.  There isn't a day we aren't in it for our own company and for our clients.  From our sales pipeline to lead nurturing, to client interactions, Sharpspring is something we have wrapped a lot of our process in.  Each person involved in our company regardless level or position used Sharpspring in some way.  At each point in our sales process is gives us a place to see if our own marketing efforts are working, which leads need attention, and what content is being effective - all of these things we do for our clients as well.

all_reviews.review_title: SharpSpring - Marketing Automation and CRM combined
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
I've been using SharpSpring on a daily basis for the past 6 months. I've implemented for my own company and for clients.

The built in CRM is a huge advantage and is perfect for BDM teams or smaller companies. Obviously if you can make do without a full-featured CRM like Salesforce, you'll save thousands $$ by switching to a simpler product like SharpSpring. (I used to use Act-on integrated with Salesforce and that was an absolute pig, and I've used Marketo - albeit 3 years ago and not for long.)

Compared to these other MA platforms I'm finding SharpSpring easier and more productive.

Things to know -

The separation of Tasks and Workflows makes SharpSpring easier to use in my opinion, compared to Act-on.

The templates provided for rapidly building landing pages are excellent.

The new personas feature is brilliant when combined with "Dynamic content blocks" (which you can use on landing pages as well as Emails. This saves me a lot of work. One of the problems I had with Act-on was the way the emails, lists and so forth multiplied in a short space of time. Dynamic content in SharpSpring means I can compose one Email that works for different audiences. So the content management aspects just stay under control much more easily.

Cost - SharpSpring is much less expensive than Act-On and Marketo.  You get unlimited users on their standard license plans - so you're not penalised for spreading use across Marketing, BDMs and Sales folk. When I was using the other MA platforms adding an additional sales user increased the cost which came out of my marketing budget. Ridiculous!



What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
SharpSpring is a smaller company and that comes across sometimes from a QA perspective. I come across the occasional feature that could do with some refinement. But they're happy to take my feedback and the technical support is both personable and fast.

One silly thing is that pre-filled forms works better (easier to configure) on 3rd party websites like WordPress than on SharpSpring's own landing pages. But I expect in a few weeks they'll sort that out - its an obvious improvement that they should make to the Landing page builder, which is otherwise excellent.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
Well worth evaluating - especially if you're a small to mid-sized business or marketing agency

Lead generation / content marketing / marketing automation for my own company as well as my clients

all_reviews.review_title: Invaluable for our Lead Gen
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
We've been using SharpSpring for just over a year and it has become an invaluable part of our lead generation process as well as our sales management.

We're a B2B business so it's very much about relationships and SharpSpring allows us to find that critical balance between automation and personalisation.

From a Lead gen perspective it does a lot of the hard work for us in terms of gathering information we can gain insights from, around our leads. The flexibility around weighting leads means we focus our energy in the right places.

Focus is also the key benefit it provides me for my sales team. We use it extensively for our sales teams to manage leads, targets and projections. At a glance I'm able to see where the key opportunities are for any particular month and focus my energy and support on the sales people that sit with those leads. Additionally for those struggling, I can get a picture of where in the sales process they are having difficulty and provide the support and training needed. It allows me to prioritise my time more effectively.

Finally I love they way they continue to evolve the product. As I mentioned we've only been using it for just over a year but the team at SharpSpring never seem to be satisfied and always look to add new features. They push our teams with their functionality, rather than the other way around.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
I feel the features and ability to control what you do and don't want to use and how you want to use it makes the benefits far outweigh any negatives, but if I'm nit picking the newsletter design interface is the only thing not as intuitive as I'd like it.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Interestingly enough we didn't start using SharpSpring to gain the benefits marketing automation brings, but rather the need for us was to ensure we were focusing our time in the right areas of our sales process in order to gain the greatest value. The marketing automation stuff was a bonus.

We have seen more accountability from our sales teams and through the insight provided in the reporting a better ability to know where to focus time and which customers to prioritise. The true benefit has been an increase in sales and a happier sales force.

The benefits were such that we have started to recommend the product to our clients and have become a reseller.

all_reviews.review_title: Value Provided Outweighs Quirks
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
As an agency that specializes in lead generation, being able to verify form submissions leads to more accurate reporting and a higher level of trust with our customer. SharpSpring allows us to insert ourselves into our clients' sales process, which further intertwines us with them.

The ability to leverage the Visitor ID tool to visualize and score anonymous user activity has been invaluable. In the past 6 months, we've closed nearly one million dollars in new business, and every one of them never filled a form out on our site. We were able to see a business was on our site, and we reached out to them.

Automated workflows are a great tool to assist a sales team in becoming more efficient.

What do you dislike about Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform?
SharpSpring has a few quirks that aren't that big of a deal, but when you use it daily are a bit of an inconvenience. For instance, it lacks a global date range filter and tabbed-style browsing, which end up adding an extra 20% of time to in-depth reporting.

They are always improving the platform and rolling out new features. Unfortunately, those new features often still feel "beta" in nature. We used their dynamic landing page tool when it first came out and there was a bug that would completely wipe out the coding/progress we had saved (multiple times). We eventually abandoned using it. A few months later it was no longer an issue. However, we had already put in a good 20+ hours into the project.

Recommendations to others considering Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform:
SharpSpring is very versatile. We have clients who use it as their CRM, as a SalesForce supplement, and some who only use it for drip campaigns/eBlasts. The ROI is great for any of those previous implementations, as cost is minimal.

This product is necessary for any B2B company. Being able to see businesses that were browsing our site revolutionized our new business development. It's very easy to set up (a Google Analytics-esque pixel), and there is fantastic customer support should you need it. Every new client that onboards with us gets put on SharpSpring, and every one has ended up relying on it for everyday business needs.

What problems is Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
As an agency, SharpSpring helps us discover new clients--ones that are browsing our site but not submitting forms. We'd have no knowledge of their interest without SharpSpring. On the client side, we are assisting clients with a more efficient sales process (implementing automated workflows) and increasing trust as we are able to verify all form submissions, and adjust marketing costs based on quality of those leads.
